name: The Super Fun Puzzle Book of Horror
description:
A super fun mini collection of puzzles and games inspired by the super fiends of horror cinema! 

16 pages, B&W with Colour Cover

name: Final Girl Poster - Laurie Strode
description:
Dedicated to those lovely, lovely survivors of the slasher genre and beyond.  These wonderful new Final Girl Posters portray the original trio of perhaps the most successful movies of the genre - Halloween, Friday the 13th and The Texas Chainsaw Massacre.
The first in the series portrays perhaps the most famous Final Girl, Laurie Strode from John Carpenters Halloween!

31cm x 41cm Glossy

name: Final Girl Poster - Sally Hardesty
description:
Dedicated to those lovely, lovely survivors of the slasher genre and beyond. These wonderful new Final Girl Posters portray the original trio of perhaps the most successful movies of the genre - Halloween, Friday the 13th and The Texas Chainsaw Massacre.
The second in the series portrays Sally Hardesty from The Texas Chainsaw Massacre! Sally is the only one of the first set of Final Girls to have survived her horror franchise, though she has without a doubt suffered above and beyond the call of a typical Final Girl.

31cm x 41cm Glossy

name: Final Girl Poster - Alice Hardy
description:
Dedicated to those lovely, lovely survivors of the slasher genre and beyond. These wonderful new Final Girl Posters portray the original trio of perhaps the most successful movies of the genre - Halloween, Friday the 13th and The Texas Chainsaw Massacre.
The second in the series portrays Alice Hardy from Friday the 13th!  She holds the duel honour of being both Friday the 13ths first ever Final Girl as well as being Jason Voorhees' first ever victim.

31cm x 41cm Glossy

name: Final Girl Postcards - Set of 3
description:
Dedicated to those lovely, lovely survivors of the slasher genre and beyond. This wonderful set of 3 Final Girl Postcards portrays the original trio of perhaps the most successful movies of the genre - Halloween, Friday the 13th and The Texas Chainsaw Massacre.
Contained in the set are Sally Hardesty, Laurie Strode and Alice Hardy.
